titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5377) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the limitation on deduction of State and local taxes, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5377) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the limitation on deduction of State and local taxes, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-357, by Mrs. Torres (CA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 64.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 772.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 195 (Roll no. 697).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 698).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5377 (Restoring Tax Fairness for States and Localities Act).
